title: PM greets overseas Pakistanis, world Muslims celebrating Eid-ul-Fitr
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 21 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Friday extended greetings to the overseas Pakistanis and other Muslims across the world celebrating Eid-ul-Fitr.
In a tweet, he wished them all a “very happy and blessed” Eid.
“May Allah Kareem accept our worship and forgive our sins,” the prime minister wrote.
